headline: Ask HN: Bulk install software or provisioning software on Windows
description:
Hey all,

Trying to find a better way to install all of my dev tools when I get a fresh copy of Windows on my laptop. Current process is manual - just remember the programs I need/use/want then download and install one by one. It's tedious as you can imagine.

Are there any projects out there that ease this process? Ninite is pretty slick but the list of software is slim. Trying to find a better way to automate this task and looking to this group to crowdsource answers.

Thanks!
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 在Windows上批量安装软件或配置软件
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 在Windows上批量安裝軟件或配置軟件
description_zh-Hans:
大家好，

当我在笔记本电脑上得到一个新的Windows副本时，我试图找到一个更好的方法来安装我的所有开发工具。目前的过程是手动的--只是记住我需要/使用/想要的程序，然后一个一个地下载和安装。这很乏味，你可以想象。

有没有什么项目可以简化这个过程？Ninite是相当聪明的，但软件的清单却很狭小。试图找到一个更好的方法来自动完成这项任务，并希望在这个小组中寻找到答案。
